text: Huashan railway station () is a railway station of Longhai railway located in Huayin, Weinan, Shaanxi, China. ==History== The station was opened in 1934 as Dongquandian railway station (). ==References== Category:Railway stations in Shaanxi Category:Stations on the Longhai Railway Category:Railway stations in China opened in 1934
title: Huashan railway station
